summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; authorizing the execution of Grant Agreement EM999339 from the State of Washington, Military Department, Division of Emergency Management for mitigation grant funds in the amount of One Million Three Hundred Twelve Thousand Five Hundred Dollars ($1,312,500) in support of the Duwamish Head/Alki Avenue Subsurface Drainage project; accepting the money when received; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
